alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Franklin; Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:29PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pittsylvania, south central Bedford and east central Franklin Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1028 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ajax, or near Penhook, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Penhook... Southern Smith Mountain Lake... Ajax... Smith Mountain Lake State Park... North Shore... and Union Hall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
